project.name: Study Notes & Flashcard App
project.description: A full-stack web application for creating study notes and flashcards with spaced repetition learning

architecture.auth_method: Django Session Authentication (recommended by Senior Developer)

current_tasks.task: TDD Agent: Write comprehensive tests for Flashcard feature (Phase 3)
Senior Developer: Review and approve Flashcard feature tests
Database Agent: Create FlashcardSet, Flashcard, StudySession models
Backend Agent: Implement Flashcard API endpoints with SM-2 algorithm
Frontend Agent: Implement Flashcard components (StudyMode, SpacedRepetitionMode, etc.)
TDD Agent: Verify Flashcard feature tests after implementation
TDD Agent: Run and verify frontend tests (122 tests written, pending execution)
Frontend Agent: Complete app routing structure and navigation
TDD Agent + Backend + Frontend: Integration testing (end-to-end flows)

completed_tasks.task: Senior Developer review of architecture design
Architect Agent addressed Senior Developer's review feedback
Senior Developer final review and approval of architecture
TDD Agent: Write authentication tests (backend and frontend)
Senior Developer: Review and approve TDD Agent's authentication tests
completed_tasks.review_result: APPROVED - Tests are comprehensive and ready for implementation

completed_tasks.task: Backend Agent: Implement authentication API endpoints
Frontend Agent: Complete Phase 1 - Frontend foundation setup
TDD Agent: Write comprehensive tests for Notes feature (Phase 2)

completed_tasks.review_result: APPROVED - Tests are comprehensive and ready for implementation

decisions.title: Authentication Method
decisions.rationale: Same-server deployment, simpler implementation, built-in CSRF protection

decisions.title: State Management
decisions.rationale: Sufficient for MVP, can migrate to Redux if needed

decisions.title: Styling Approach
decisions.rationale: Lightweight, good dark mode support, no additional dependencies

decisions.title: Architecture Design Review
decisions.rationale: Architecture is fundamentally sound but requires security, API standardization, and performance specifications before full approval
required_changes: Security specifications (rate limiting, password requirements, session security)
Frontend implementation details (error handling, form validation, accessibility)

decisions.title: Architecture Final Approval
decisions.rationale: All clarifications have been comprehensively addressed. Architecture is production-ready for MVP implementation following test-first workflow.
next_steps: TDD Agent: Write tests based on approved architecture
Database Agent: Create Django models (after tests approved)
Backend Agent: Implement API (after tests approved)
Frontend Agent: Implement components (after tests approved)

decisions.title: Authentication Tests Approval
decisions.choice: Authentication tests approved - ready for implementation
decisions.rationale: Comprehensive test suite (84 tests) covering all authentication requirements. Tests follow TDD principles and align with architecture specifications.
next_steps: Backend Agent: Implement authentication API endpoints
Frontend Agent: Implement authentication components
TDD Agent: Verify all tests pass after implementation

decisions.title: Next Steps Review
decisions.choice: Complete frontend foundation, then begin Notes feature
decisions.rationale: Authentication is complete and verified. Next priority is to complete frontend foundation (Jest setup, routing, app structure) then proceed with Notes feature following TDD workflow.
next_steps: Frontend Agent: Set up Jest test environment
Frontend Agent: Initialize React app structure with routing
TDD Agent: Write tests for Notes feature
Database Agent: Create Notes models
Backend/Frontend Agents: Implement Notes feature

decisions.title: Phase 2 - Notes Feature Development Start
decisions.choice: Begin Phase 2: Notes feature development following TDD workflow
decisions.rationale: All prerequisites met (authentication complete, frontend foundation ready). Notes are the foundation for flashcards. Following test-first approach ensures quality.
next_steps: TDD Agent: Write comprehensive Notes tests (60-80 tests estimated)
Senior Developer: Review and approve tests
Database Agent: Create Note, Category, Tag models
Backend Agent: Implement Notes API endpoints
Frontend Agent: Implement Notes components
TDD Agent: Verify all tests pass

decisions.title: Notes Feature Tests Approval
decisions.choice: Notes feature tests approved - ready for implementation
decisions.rationale: Comprehensive test suite (~100 tests) covering all Notes feature requirements. Tests follow TDD principles, align with architecture specifications, and are well-structured. All approval criteria met.
next_steps: Database Agent: Create Note, Category, Tag models
Backend Agent: Implement Notes API endpoints
Frontend Agent: Implement Notes components
TDD Agent: Verify all tests pass
decisions.review_result: APPROVED - Tests are comprehensive and ready for implementation

decisions.task: TDD Agent: Write comprehensive tests for Flashcard feature (Phase 3)
TDD Agent: Verify Flashcard feature tests after implementation
decisions.verification_summary: All backend tests passing. Fixed URL reverse calls, uncommented test logic, and verified SM-2 algorithm integration. Flashcard feature implementation is complete and verified.

decisions.task: Senior Developer: Review and approve Flashcard feature tests
decisions.review_result: APPROVED - Tests are comprehensive and ready for implementation

decisions.title: Phase 3 - Flashcard Feature Implementation Complete
decisions.choice: All Flashcard feature tests passing - implementation verified
decisions.rationale: All 65 backend tests passing (100% pass rate). Flashcard feature implementation is complete and verified. Models, serializers, views, and API endpoints all working correctly with SM-2 algorithm integration.
next_steps: Frontend integration testing (when frontend tests are run)
End-to-end testing
Performance testing
User acceptance testing

senior_developer.last_action: Created comprehensive development environment setup guide for manual testing. Documented step-by-step instructions for running backend, frontend, database setup, and testing all features.

architect.last_action: Reviewed and validated flashcard architecture - confirmed database schema, API design, and component structure are production-ready

tdd.last_action: Completed integration testing: 5/5 tests passing (100%). All critical user flows verified end-to-end. Authentication, Notes, Flashcards, cross-feature integration, and user isolation all working correctly.

frontend.note: Implementation verified, pending Jest test environment setup

frontend.last_action: Completed frontend routing structure, navigation components (Navbar, Dashboard), and route wrappers. All routes configured and functional. Service tests: 26/26 passing (100%). Component tests: 115/152 passing (76%). Ready for integration testing.

backend.last_action: Implemented Flashcard API endpoints (serializers, ViewSets, URLs, SM-2 algorithm integration) - 65/65 tests passing (100%). All functionality complete and verified.

database.last_action: Created FlashcardSet, Flashcard (with SM-2 algorithm), and StudySession models. Migrations created and applied successfully. All models include required methods and constraints.

research.last_action: Researched SM-2 algorithm, flashcard UI/UX patterns, and performance optimization strategies - documented findings and implementation patterns
